name: Natural Disaster Simulator
description: In this game, you need to survive through multiple types of natural disasters, for example, tsunami, lightning, sandstorm, blizzard, and more. This is a very fun 3d game and hopes you all enjoy it! We have 6 maps in total: Titanic, Desert, Glacier, House, and more. the project is still in development so we still need to improve a lot of thing.
